nodes.text: Star Wars Battlefront: Mobile is the first installment of the Battlefront series released on the cell phone. It was released in the U.S. on November 1, 2005, the same day as Star Wars: Battlefront II.
The game is a shooter-based that is coupled with interactive community action on cell phones.

The player chooses one of the four factions proposed, the Republic, the CIS, the Rebellion or the Empire. The galaxy is represented as a set of 15 planets, each divided into sections, whose players are trying to take control. In each game session, the player has to eliminate the maximum of enemies for a period of time. A score is then associated with his performance, and determined whether he had conquered the area or not. On each planet, the player who managed to control the most zones then took command of the world.
